body.name: Toshiba Canvio Slim 1TB Portable External Hard Drive USB 3.0, Black - HDTD310XK3DA
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 20 hrs 47 mins
features: Up to 2TB storage capacity to store your growing files and content
Toshiba storage backup software (downloadable) to easily back up your content and schedule your backup to run automatically
Toshiba storage security software (downloadable) to help prevent unauthorized access to your data with a password lock feature
body.description: The Canvio Slim portable external hard drive offers high capacity storage in an ultra-portable form factor. Powered by USB 3.0 technology, the thin aluminum design allows you to store your data with style and convenience. Paired with easy-to-use software (5) for security and automatic backups, your data stays safe while you’re on-the-go. [Note]: (1) One Terabyte (1TB) means 10{12] = 1,000,000,000,000 bytes using powers of 10. Actual formatted storage capacity may vary. For details, please visit Toshiba's Consumer HDD website. (2) Drive formatted NTFS for Windows PC. Reformatting required for Mac computers. Compatibility may vary depending on user‘s hardware configuration and operating system. s Consumer HDD website. (4) Product specifications, colors, features, software, and availability are subject to change without notice. (5) Software is available via free download that is subject to Toshiba’s standard End User License Agreement. Software is compatible with Windows PC only.

productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 1,595 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Features Store With Style Take your content with you almost anywhere with the ultra-portable, lightweight design of the Canvio Slim, able to store up to 2TB(1) of data in a sleek, stylish aluminum case. Safe and Secure Keep your files safe and secure with automatic backup and password protection features. The Toshiba Storage Security Software and Storage Backup Software (available via free download[5]) make safeguarding your content easy and hassle-free. Built to Travel The slim, lightweight design allows you to hold virtually everything and carry next to nothing, so you can travel with ease. Convenient USB technology allows high speed data transfer with no external AC power cord needed so you can feel confident bringing your drive with you on-the-go, and wherever life takes you.

Canvio Slim Portable External Hard Drive Data storage that is as portable as it is stylish. The Canvio Slim makes storing your content lighter than ever, carrying up to 2TB(1) of data in a thin, sleek aluminum case. Combining design and portability, the Canvio Slim is the elegant storage solution you need for your on-the-go lifestyle.

Ultra-Portable Design Slim and stylish design in a lightweight aluminum casing, customized to fit your lifestyle in either a silver or black color. Compact Storage Up to 2TB(1) of storage capacity to save your growing files and content. USB 3.0 & 2.0 Compatible USB technology allows high speed data transfer with no external AC power cord needed. Data Protection Easy to use Auto Backup and Password Protection Software(5) to help safeguard your data (via free download, for Windows PC only). Ultra-Portable Design Compact Storage USB 3.0 & 2.0 Compatible Data Protection

reviews.reviewText: Plenty of storage on a simple to use, attractive, external memory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as external PS4 hard-drive
reviews.reviewText: Used to add an external drive to my PS4. Works as intended and cheaper than the PS4 branded models.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sufficient and reliable external Hard drive.
reviews.reviewText: Reliable data storage for backup of your PC.However, NTFS option for Win format did not fully allowed to download Monterey OS for Apple device as an external source of operating system. Due to Disc Utility this Toshiba HD after full disc formatting was adapted to store video/audio and data docs, but not the Mac OS itself...Good quality Hard Drive USB 3.0 for amateur use. Compact, slim and easy to connect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truely Plug 'n Play
reviews.reviewText: It took me about 15 minutes to set the drive up (I have learned to be very ODC with any computer hardware installation over the last35 years). I plugged it in, did something else for maybe 30 seconds and looked... the power/usage light was on. Downloaded Backup Software, Revisions History and Manual with ease from the link supplied on the new HDD.After a couple of false starts (I had folders with Admin Only access), it is now dutifully backing up the internal SSI of my Laptop (now at 23% after 8 minutes to give you an idea of its speed).It is the easiest external HDD add I've ever done (except maybe my previous 1.0TB Toshiba that was stolen) by far. Could NOT have been simpler. Just follow the already loaded directions. Buy this one! (Toshiba Canvio Slim) without hesitation. Pass on cheaper ones. They're not that much cheaper and you'll pay for it over time. I had my previous Toshiba 1.0TB (earlier version obviously) for at least 6 or 7 years and it never faltered. Not once!After this glowing recommendation, keep in mind that I can be very tough on reviews if the product is marginal. If fact, I rated this as only 4 stars for Service (because I have NEVER needed to use it :) ) and Storage Capacity (only because 5.0TB HDD's are available now, that's why the price has dropped so dramatically... "Old Technology". I think this was about $70-$80 only less than six months ago, I paid $53).If you need more storage, you absolutely cannot miss with this choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Llegó en tiempo y en excelentes condiciones, fácil de utilizar, en la publicación dice ser USB 1.1, pero el que recibí es USB 3.0, ligero, pequeño y fácil de transportar. Excelente capacidad, respaldé cerca de 40GB que acumulado en cerca de 10 años, por lo que aún le queda bastante espacio por delante.
Boa performance e design muito bonito. Não vem com software de backup incluso, mas há um link para baixá-lo diretamente do site da Toshiba.

I don’t know with regard to the HDD at this point since I just got it but I just am very impressed with the firm metal used. It’s not some flimsy thin aluminum like WD. It’s quality works with the cost. Performance has been fine for a little bit of usage. The only thing that frustrates me is is that Toshiba doesn’t provide anti slip feet on their hdds anymore. Very happy with this though. Way Better build structure than all other big brands with regard to casing quality. In today’s time I’m impressed. I’m used to garbage quality at this point.
J'ai acheté ce produit pour faire une sauvegarde de mes photos et le tout fonctionne correctement
